entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Alma
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:03 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mistook 8:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Humidity: 80 %

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
